channel.title: Azure Freak Confessions
channel.description: Recent content on Azure Freak Confessions

item.title: Azure Virtual Desktop - Magazine article
item.description: Last year I published an article in our Xpirit Magazine #13 about Azure Virtual Desktop. In this post I will give you a summary of the article.

item.title: My Xpirit Magazine Articles
item.description: My articles regarding Azure Virtual Desktop and Azure Landing Zones are in the Xpirit Magazine #13.

item.title: Shared Image Gallery
item.description: What is a Shared Image Gallery? The Shared Image Gallery is a repository for images that can be used to create VMs.

item.title: Xpirit Innovation Day
item.description: At Xpirit, we organize Innovation Days once every two months. That’s a pretty high frequency. But Authority is our mission and we can only reach our goal by constantly pushing boundaries and exploring new techniques.

item.title: Infrastructure as Code
item.description: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) is a DevOps methodology that allows you to manage your infrastructure as code.

item.title: Cloud Adoption Framework
item.description: The Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure is a full lifecycle framework that enables cloud architects, IT professionals, and business decision makers to achieve their cloud adoption goals.

item.title: Azure Virtual Desktop
item.description: Azure Virtual Desktop is Microsoft’s desktop and app virtualization Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) service that runs on Microsoft Azure.

item.title: Azure Landing Zones
item.description: An Azure landing zone is the output of a multi-subscription Azure environment that accounts for scale, security governance, networking, and identity.

item.title: About
item.description: Professionally A consultant with 12+ years experience working with an incredible amount of companies to help them reach their goals and guide them through their journey.
